summary: This is an email correspondence regarding obtaining a subpoena for a Massachusetts birth certificate from the Massachusetts Registry of Vital Records & Statistics. The sender is following up on previous contact and attaching a trial subpoena, asking if the recipient can serve it.

events.title: Subpoena Request for Birth Certificate
events.description: An email is sent regarding obtaining a subpoena for a Massachusetts birth certificate from the Massachusetts Registry of Vital Records & Statistics, as the registry has been unresponsive.

keyFacts: A subpoena is being sought for a Massachusetts birth certificate.
The Massachusetts Registry of Vital Records & Statistics has been unresponsive to previous requests.
The correspondence includes an attached trial subpoena and asks if the recipient can serve it.
